imdb.plot outline: Henriette - also called Henry - feels obligated to join a running club because she has to run the DHL run with her co-workers. Henry wants to get in shape so she does not make a fool out of herself in front of her new boss and colleagues. Henry starts training and meets the other members at the running club who all run for very different and personal reasons. H.P. cannot stand to be at home with his family and Lærke is always busy making Instagram stories from her oh-so-healthy life. The day of the DHL run is approaching but unfortunately Henry gets fired and therefore sees no reason to continue in the running club. But the time that Henry has spent with them has taught her to run for her own sake and nobody elses. Henry decides to officially sign up as a member at the running club but now with a much bigger and more ambitious goal - to run a marathon.
imdb.title: Løbeklubben
plot: Henriette - also called Henry - feels obligated to join a running club because she has to run the DHL run with her co-workers. Henry wants to get in shape so she does not make a fool out of herself in front of her new boss and colleagues. Henry starts training and meets the other members at the running club who all run for very different and personal reasons. H.P. cannot stand to be at home with his family and Lærke is always busy making Instagram stories from her oh-so-healthy life. The day of the DHL run is approaching but unfortunately Henry gets fired and therefore sees no reason to continue in the running club. But the time that Henry has spent with them has taught her to run for her own sake and nobody elses. Henry decides to officially sign up as a member at the running club but now with a much bigger and more ambitious goal - to run a marathon.
